import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef} from 'react' const Profilepic = ({changeprofile}) => { const hiddenFileInput=useRef(null) const [url, set] = useState(second) const handleclick=()=>{ hiddenFileInput.current.click() } const postDetails = ()=>{ console.log(body,image) const data=new FormData(); data.append("file",image) data.append("upload_presets","INSTA_CLONE") data.append("cloud_name","cloudchandana") fetch(" https://api.cloudinary.com/v1_1/cloudchandana/image/upload",{ method:"post", body:data }).then( res => res.json()) .then(data=>setUrl(data.url)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) console.log(url) } return (

change profile photo

) } export default Profilepic
